```{python}

import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from fredapi import Fred

# Fred API Key (keep private!)
fred = Fred(api_key='9357b21a793f849a3ef134b4aab0d7a1')

```

### US GDP

```{python}

# ---- US GDP Data ----
gdp_data = fred.get_series('GDP', observation_start='2000-01-01')
gdp_df = gdp_data.reset_index()
gdp_df.columns = ['Date', 'GDP']

fig_gdp = px.line(
    gdp_df,
    x='Date',
    y='GDP',
    title='ðŸ“ˆ US GDP Over Time',
    labels={'GDP': 'GDP (Billions of Dollars)'}
)
fig_gdp.update_layout(margin=dict(t=60, b=40), height=500)
fig_gdp.show()

```
